participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.background: I'm interested in learning more about how to cope with my wife's terminal cancer. I sometimes spend hours practicing bird calls, even though I'm not very good at it. I love spending time with my dog on Christmas. My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both. I vacation in Florida every winter.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.background: I once met a celebrity while I was walking my dogs. My major was American literature and education. My landlord is raising my rent, so I bought a used Ford Focus to save money. I am pleased that my family is close and that I get to spend a lot of time with them. My father died when I was 2.

content.text: Hi, I'm Alex. I'm interested in learning more about how to cope with my wife's terminal cancer.
Hi Alex, I'm Sarah. I'm so sorry to hear about your wife. I'm here for you if you need anything.
What kind of things do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time with my family and my dog. I also love to practice bird calls, even though I'm not very good at it.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love spending time with my family too. I don't have a dog, but I love animals.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, write, and go for walks. I also like to go to the movies and watch TV.
Those sound like great hobbies! I love to read and write too.
It's hard to say, but I think I'd have to say "The Great Gatsby".
That's a great book! I love F. Scott Fitzgerald.
Me too! He's one of my favorite authors.
I'm glad to hear that. I think we're going to get along just fine.
